author: Geoff Zochodne
title: Ontario unveils $17-billion coronavirus plan, foresees zero economic growth in 2020
description: Ontario’s deficit for 2020-2021 is now projected to be $20.5 billion, up from an estimated $9.2 billion a year prior
content: Ontario Premier Doug Ford’s government unveiled a $17-billion plan Wednesday to protect businesses, households and public services from the financial fallout of the novel coronavirus, which the province predicts will bring economic growth to a screeching halt… [+3965 chars]
